title: Add Avantia logo to landing page

requirements.summary: Add Avantia logo to header/navigation area with responsive sizing
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is visible in the header/top section of the landing page
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
Logo is responsive and scales appropriately on mobile devices
Logo uses the uploaded AVANTIA_LOGO.png file as source

file_operations.description: Add Avantia logo to the hero section header area, positioning it prominently at the top. Implement responsive sizing using Tailwind classes (e.g., h-12 md:h-16) to ensure proper display on mobile and desktop. Use the AVANTIA_LOGO.png asset with proper alt text and maintain aspect ratio.

requirements.summary: Render generated Avantia logo as static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is accessible from the frontend/public/assets/generated path
Image is properly imported and rendered in the component
No routing through backend is used for the logo asset

file_operations.description: Import and render the generated Avantia logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/avantia-logo.dim_400x200.png as a static asset. Reference the image using the public path /assets/generated/avantia-logo.dim_400x200.png in the img src attribute. Ensure the image is loaded as a frontend static asset without backend routing.
